content: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase. The item must be unused and in original packaging. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.
We offer free shipping on orders over $50. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping takes 1-2 business days.
We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, and Apple Pay. Crypto payments are currently not supported.
You can reach our support team at support@sparktech.com or call us at +1-800-555-0199. Available 24/7.
SparkTech is a leading AI solutions provider specializing in chatbots, automation, and data analytics.
